user_instruction: 'Send an email with some wellness tips for my client Mark Thompson (mark.thompson@email.com). You can check out my NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["mark.thompson@email.com"],"subject":"Simple Daily Wellness Tips to Support Your Well-Being","body":"Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to share a few quick wellness practices you can easily weave into your day. Pick the ones that resonate most and feel free to adapt them to your routine.

1. Hydrate Early and Often
   • Start your morning with a glass of water before coffee or tea.
   • Keep a bottle at your desk as a visual reminder; aim to sip regularly rather than chugging occasionally.

2. Micro-Movement Breaks
   • Every hour or so, stand up, roll your shoulders, and stretch your spine.
   • A 1-minute walk around the room or gentle calf raises can counteract long periods of sitting.

3. Breath Reset
   • Try the “4-4-6” pattern: inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 6. Repeat for 5 cycles.
   • This simple exercise reduces tension and refocuses the mind when tasks pile up.

4. Screen-Savers for the Eyes
   • Follow the 20-20-20 rule: every 20 minutes, look 20 feet away for 20 seconds.
   • Adjust your monitor height so your gaze is slightly downward; this eases neck strain.

5. Evening Wind-Down Ritual
   • Dim lights, silence notifications, and step away from screens at least 30 minutes before bed.
   • A brief journal entry or light stretching signals your body that it’s time to rest.

Consistency beats intensity, so integrating even one or two of these habits can make a noticeable difference over time.

Let me know how these suggestions work for you or if you’d like ideas tailored to any specific goals.

Take care,
[Your Name]"}
